guidelines.title: Profanity and Offensive Content
guidelines.content: Avoid using any profane, offensive, or inappropriate language in both text and imagery. Maintain a professional and respectful tone.

guidelines.title: Plantsy Guidelines
guidelines.content: Adhere to the guidelines set by Plantsy to ensure consistency and alignment with the platform's values. This might include aesthetic preferences, ethical considerations, and behavior expectations.

guidelines.title: Accurate Representation
guidelines.content: Provide accurate and truthful information in your service post. Misleading descriptions, images, or pricing can erode trust with potential customers.

guidelines.title: Original Content
guidelines.content: Only use images and content that you have the rights to use. Avoid using copyrighted or plagiarized materials.

guidelines.title: Respect Copyright and Trademarks
guidelines.content: Do not use copyrighted logos, images, or other content without proper authorization. Respect trademarks and intellectual property rights.

guidelines.title: No Discrimination
guidelines.content: Do not discriminate against individuals based on race, gender, age, religion, or any other characteristic. Your service should be accessible to everyone.

guidelines.title: Legal Compliance
guidelines.content: Ensure that your service complies with all relevant laws and regulations in your area. This includes licenses, permits, and any industry-specific requirements.

guidelines.title: Clear Pricing
guidelines.content: Clearly outline your pricing structure and any additional costs. Avoid hidden fees or charges that might surprise customers later.

guidelines.title: Professional Conduct
guidelines.content: Maintain professional conduct when interacting with customers. Promptly respond to inquiries, be respectful, and provide excellent customer service.

guidelines.title: No Harassment
guidelines.content: Do not engage in any form of harassment, bullying, or aggressive behavior. Treat all customers and users with respect.

guidelines.title: Privacy and Confidentiality
guidelines.content: Respect the privacy of your customers. Do not share their personal information without their explicit consent.

guidelines.title: Accurate Contact Information
guidelines.content: Keep your contact information up-to-date. If customers have questions or need assistance, they should be able to reach you easily.

guidelines.title: Cancellation and Refund Policy
guidelines.content: If applicable, clearly communicate your cancellation and refund policy. This helps manage expectations and prevent misunderstandings.

guidelines.title: No Harmful Practices
guidelines.content: Do not offer services that involve harmful or unethical practices, such as using harmful chemicals or methods that damage the environment or human health.

guidelines.title: Consent for Work
guidelines.content: Obtain proper consent from property owners or relevant parties before performing any work on their property.

guidelines.title: Safety Precautions
guidelines.content: If your service involves physical work, outline any safety precautions customers should take before and after the service.

guidelines.title: Transparent Reviews
guidelines.content: If you receive reviews from customers, ensure they are genuine and reflect their honest experiences.

guidelines.title: No Spam or Unwanted Communication
guidelines.content: Do not engage in spamming or send unsolicited messages to customers. Respect their preferences for communication.
